title: fvPagination
description: To create full featured pagination element use this component.

prop.name: total
prop.description: Total pages count. if you havn't, you can play with the navigation, next and prev props and leave it.

prop.name: size
prop.description: Length of pages appear to pagination. if you dont set total, it's not affect.

prop.name: next
prop.description: Handle disabled state of next button. If you dont set navigation. It's not usable. Also if you set the total and navigation props together, component consider this as false if value equal to total.

prop.name: prev
prop.description: Handle disabled state of prev button. If you dont set navigation. It's not usable. Also if you set the total and navigation props together, component consider this as false if value equal to 1.

event.name: input
event.description: Fired when component request to change value (when user try to change the current page).

note: If you click on selected page button in run-time, you can change current page by custom number.
